result.Case Summary: NASD LETTER OF ACCEPTANCE, WAIVER AND CONSENT NO. C01050001 TO: Department of Enforcement NASD RE: Chad Matthew Schmidt General Securities Representative (CRD No. 2724906) Pursuant to Rule 9216 of NASD Code of Procedure, I submit this Letter of Acceptance; Waiver and Consent ("AWC") for the purpose of proposing a settlement of the alleged rule violations described in Part II below. This AWC is submitted on the condition that, if accepted, NASD will not bring any future actions against me alleging violations
result.Document Type: AWCs (Letters of Acceptance, Waiver, and Consent)
